text: 252-1 Imagine a vast sheet of paper on which straight Lines, Triangles, Squares, Pentagons, Hexagons, and other figures, instead of remaining fixed in their places, move freely about on or in the surface, but without the power of rising above or sinking below it, very much like shadows - only hard and with luminous edges - and you will then have a pretty correct notion of my country and countrymen. Alas, a few years ago, I should have said Hinnnn no dnnnn nnnnnn nn pnnnnn ung dnn mnn nn nnn nnn :ennnnnn nn,, Imagine imggine a vast sheet of paper on which Stroight Lines, Triangks, Squoes, Pentagons. Hexagons, and! other figures , inslead! of remaining Sixed in theic places, move Freely about, on or in the surfoce, but without it, very much lile shodows -cnly hard and with luminous edges - and you os71-then have houe Said. mincl has been opened to higher olews
